start.header: Report online material promoting terrorism or extremism

source.header: Where did you find the material?

more-info.header: Can you tell us more about the material?
more-info.intro: So we can find it, please provide any information you think is helpful. You can provide a screenshot or photo on the next page.

report-reason.summary: Explain what the material is and why it’s offensive.

image.header: Do you want to add a photo or screenshot?

evidence.summary: This is helpful if the material gets deleted. Don’t worry about saving images to your device, it’s safe because you’re reporting them.

evidence-upload.summary: This is helpful if the material gets deleted. Don’t worry about saving images to your device, it’s safe because you’re reporting them.

evidence-upload-confirm.summary: This is helpful if the material gets deleted. Don’t worry about saving images to your device, it’s safe because you’re reporting them.

evidence-url.header: Do you have a link to the material?
evidence-url.summary: It’s easier to find the material if you can provide a link to the page it appears on, or the post if it’s been posted on social media.

evidence-url-auto.summary: We used the link you provided to take an image of the web page

evidence-written.header: Do you have any other information?
evidence-written.link: Continue without providing a written statement

evidence-added-2.header: Can you provide a photo or other evidence?
evidence-added-2.summary: This is helpful if the material gets deleted. Don’t worry about saving images to your device, it’s safe because you’re reporting them.

video.header: Can you provide a copy of the video?
video.summary: This is helpful if the material gets deleted.

who-shared.header: Who shared or promoted the material?

can-we-contact.header: Are you willing to be contacted if necessary?

contact-details-method.header: How would you prefer to be contacted?
contact-details-method.label: How would you prefer to be contacted?

confirmation.alert-2: If you would like a copy of your report emailed to you, please provide an email address.
